object.name: Poll
object.description: This object contains information about a poll.
object.html_description: This object contains information about a poll.
object.rst_description: This object contains information about a poll.

annotations.description: Total number of users that voted in the poll
annotations.html_description: Total number of users that voted in the poll
annotations.rst_description: Total number of users that voted in the poll
annotations.name: total_voter_count

annotations.description: True, if the poll is closed
annotations.name: is_closed

annotations.description: True, if the poll is anonymous
annotations.name: is_anonymous

annotations.description: Poll type, currently can be 'regular' or 'quiz'
annotations.rst_description: Poll type, currently can be 'regular' or 'quiz'
annotations.name: type

annotations.description: True, if the poll allows multiple answers
annotations.html_description: True, if the poll allows multiple answers
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the poll allows multiple answers
annotations.name: allows_multiple_answers

annotations.description: 0-based identifier of the correct answer option. Available only for polls in the quiz mode, which are closed, or was sent (not forwarded) by the bot or to the private chat with the bot.
annotations.html_description: Optional. 0-based identifier of the correct answer option. Available only for polls in the quiz mode, which are closed, or was sent (not forwarded) by the bot or to the private chat with the bot.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. 0-based identifier of the correct answer option. Available only for polls in the quiz mode, which are closed, or was sent (not forwarded) by the bot or to the private chat with the bot.
annotations.name: correct_option_id

annotations.description: Text that is shown when a user chooses an incorrect answer or taps on the lamp icon in a quiz-style poll, 0-200 characters
annotations.html_description: Optional. Text that is shown when a user chooses an incorrect answer or taps on the lamp icon in a quiz-style poll, 0-200 characters
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Text that is shown when a user chooses an incorrect answer or taps on the lamp icon in a quiz-style poll, 0-200 characters
annotations.name: explanation

annotations.description: Special entities like usernames, URLs, bot commands, etc. that appear in the explanation
annotations.html_description: Optional. Special entities like usernames, URLs, bot commands, etc. that appear in the explanation
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Special entities like usernames, URLs, bot commands, etc. that appear in the *explanation*
annotations.name: explanation_entities

annotations.description: Amount of time in seconds the poll will be active after creation
annotations.html_description: Optional. Amount of time in seconds the poll will be active after creation
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Amount of time in seconds the poll will be active after creation
annotations.name: open_period

annotations.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the poll will be automatically closed
annotations.html_description: Optional. Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the poll will be automatically closed
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the poll will be automatically closed
annotations.name: close_date
